comments.html: Why in the world would you want to receive the full  internet prefix list in an active/standby uplink design? Have your providers advertise a default route to you if you're not going to do intelligent egress selection.
comments.name: Gabriel

comments.html:
In principle I agree with you ... unless your provider happens to be someone known for peering spats and unilateral de-peering actions.

Some people think it's safer to get full feed from both providers just in case one of them is missing a prefix or two.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
